summary: Add extern: CallFunction on Flash objects

comments.content: I use CallFunction a lot with my own ExternalInterface object serializer (to be released very soon)

Hi!

I am not sure if you have contributed before. Have you signed the CLA?
Yep. I have contributions in Closure Library. My CLA might be under "ivan@ludios.org".

Ah I see it now thanks.

Could you open up a code review for the patches? I just have a few question and other people might have some as well.

http://codereview.appspot.com
alan, you said you had questions about this?
I sent this to Andy, who maintains the flash externs. He said this looks fine. Thanks for the patch!
This issue was closed by revision r1082.
